r.s: How to include a loading bar in your XHTML documents quickly and easily.
r.d:
This package provides a way to add a loading bar fully customizable in existing XHTML documents. Your browser should accept DHTML feature.
Features: - allows usage of an existing stylesheet for colors and size model - all colors and size elements are customizable - show or hide text percent information - set/add and returns value of current status of progress - compliant with all CSS/XHMTL standards - integration with template engine ITx family is possible
